strings.STR_L_HTML5: This game uses HTML5. If it loads but does not run, please update your web browser.
strings.STR_WARNING_TITLE: Are you sure you want to leave Disney?
strings.STR_WARNING_TEXT: Disney does not control the website you are going to so please make sure you are happy to continue. Disney's privacy practices and controls do not apply once you leave our slte. lf you are a child reading this, please get your parent or guardian’s permission to continue.
strings.STR_WARNING_INTERNAL: Are you sure you want to leave the Star Wars Arcade?
strings.STR_SPIN_COIN: spin the coin to get free tokens!
strings.STR_TICKER_NOSCORES: BE THE FIRST TO SUBMIT YOUR SCORE TODAY!
strings.STR_HOWTOPLAY_1: Move around the arcade by clicking on the navigation arrows, or clicking and dragging the screen with your mouse.
strings.STR_HOWTOPLAY_2: Here you can play games by clicking on the arcade machines.
strings.STR_HOWTOPLAY_3: Here you can find high scores and all the latest Star Wars news!
strings.STR_HOWTOPLAY_4: Tap on this door to visit and customise your personal Star Wars room.
strings.STR_HOWTOPLAY_5: This is your Star Wars room. You can customise it using tokens you've earned by visiting the Star Wars Arcade daily and by playing arcade games.
strings.STR_HOWTOPLAY_6: Tap the Customise button to begin customising your room.
strings.STR_HOWTOPLAY_8: When you've finished customising your room, click here.
strings.STR_HOWTOPLAY_9: Your room also has a trophy cabinet.
strings.STR_HOWTOPLAY_10: Tap on it to see all the trophies you've earned!
strings.STR_WELCOME: Welcome to the the Star Wars Arcade! Every day when you return you’ll get rewarded with these Tokens.
strings.STR_TUT_1: Welcome to your 'My Star Wars Room'. Earn tokens to customise it with amazing stuff!
strings.STR_TUT_2: Welcome! Let’s go on a tour.
strings.STR_TUT_3: Here is your Star Wars Room!
strings.STR_TUT_4: This is the Comms screen. This will tell you about events, updates and other amazing Star Wars news!
strings.STR_TUT_BUY_SPACESHIP: Click the green tick to buy The Ghost!
strings.STR_TUT_GOTO_ARCADE: Now let’s play some games! Click on the door to go back out to the Arcade.
strings.STR_TUT_PLAY: Have fun, and may the Force be with you!
strings.STR_WookieWednesday: It's WOOKIEE WEDNESDAY! All in-game credits you collect are worth double today!
strings.STR_TokenTuesday: It's TOKEN TUESDAY! All Arcade tokens you collect are worth double today!
strings.STR_ForceFriday: It's FORCE FRIDAY! 25% Discount on all items in your Star Wars Room today!
strings.STR_SithSaturday: It's SITH SATURDAY - Welcome to the dark side!
strings.STR_WookieWednesday_TIP: Did you know Sabine can run faster than the other Rebels in the Team Tactics game?
strings.STR_TokenTuesday_TIP: I’m terribly sorry to bother you, but have you thought about buying a new item for your Star Wars room?
strings.STR_ForceFriday_TIP: I can feel a presence - Darth Vader is coming to Team Tactics soon!
strings.STR_SithSaturday_TIP: Did you know you can upgrade your abilities in Team Tactics to complete levels faster?
strings.STR_Halloween_TIP: Did you know you can upgrade your abilities in Team Tactics to complete levels faster?
strings.STR_Christmas_TIP: Did you know you can upgrade your abilities in Team Tactics to complete levels faster?
